text_logic_form: Find the area of the triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the triangle $ABC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AH$ is $7$.
The length of the line $BC$ is $10.2$.
The point $H$ lies on the line $BC$.
The line $AH$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
line_instances: The lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$ form the triangle $ABC$.
